0: Room service was excellent and food was top rate
The room was very clean but for the price we paid I would have expected quiet rooms
huge sandwiches tasty and very reasonably price
Breakfast the next day was reasonably priced and great with large selection
The restaurant was very good and reasonably priced
1: Wished they have offer free breakfast for the price we pay
1095 for breakfast is a little high especially for the price of 212 for a night
Rates were very expensive not a great value for the quality of my room
The Hilton Garden would not allow us a late check out and therefore we were charged for the Saturday night even though we left for home
I was surprised to find that the cost of the room did not include a breakfast like other hotels
HIgh price for something under constructoin
Two days prior to my arrival I called the hotel and spoke to a female and asked if I could use my Hilton Honors rewards points to reduce the rate of the room and she said yes
They have now charged me over 160 on top of my actual bill and no one can seem to figure out why or rectify these charges
